content:
That's great to hear! Meal prepping on Sundays is a fantastic way to set yourself up for success during the week. It's amazing how much of a difference it can make in terms of saving time, money, and stress.

Chili con carne is a perfect dish for meal prep, as it's easy to make in large quantities and reheats well. You can portion it out into individual containers and freeze them for up to 3-4 months. Then, simply thaw and reheat as needed throughout the week.

I'm excited for you to try out your chili con carne recipe! If you have any questions or need any substitutions or variations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, enjoy your meal prep Sunday and the convenience it brings to your weekdays!
